sentences.en: By the same token, heavier responsibility should devolve on factories , mines and some corporations.
sentences.cn: 相应地, 也要加强厂矿企业、一些公司的责任.

sentences.en: CEO made the whole decision - making, implementation will devolve power.
sentences.cn: CEO作出总体决策后, 具体执行权力就会下放.

sentences.en: Now it will devolve on you to manage this school.
sentences.cn: 现在这所学校就交给你办了.

sentences.en: The building will devolve to his eldest son.
sentences.cn: 这座大楼将转交给其长子.

sentences.en: We have made a conscious effort to devolve responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我们已有意识地下放职责。

sentences.en: When the Ambassador is on leave, his duties devolve upon the First Secretary.
sentences.cn: 大使休假期间, 职务由一等秘书代理.

sentences.en: When the President is ill, his duties devolve on the Vice - President.
sentences.cn: 总统生病时, 其职责由副总统代理.

sentences.en: When the president is ill, his duties devolve upon the vice - president.
sentences.cn: 当总统生病时, 其职务交由副总统代理.

sentences.en: When the President is ill, his duties devolve upon the Vice - President.
sentences.cn: 总统生病时, 其职务交由副总统代理.

sentences.en: When the President is unable to do his duties, they devolve on the Vice - President.
sentences.cn: 总统无法行使其职责时, 职责移交给总统行使.

sentences.en: While he's ill, most of his work will devolve on me.
sentences.cn: 在他生病期间, 他的大部分工作将移交给我.

words.tran_cn: 相传，转移；委付；依次；落下

trans.tran_en: if land, money etc devolves to someone, it becomes their property when someone else dies

trans.tran_cn: 移交，转移，交给下属（或下层、晚辈等），衰落
